metadata.description: As the brains and driving force behind Facebook Mark Zuckerberg has become the youngest billionaire in the history of the planet. The road to success for both his creation and him personally was not preordained nor was it always a smooth ride. Learn how a young man's frustration with women helped spark an idea that would have him dating Victoria's Secret models and how a socially inept young man wound up creating a company that has revolutionized the way hundreds of millions of people all over the globe socialize with each other.
metadata.name: Mark Zuckerberg
